t: A Collection - Josh Groban: Amazon.co.uk: CDs & Vinyl
s: I was not acquainted with Josh Grobans music at all. I just happen to see a duet on YouTube he performed with Celine Dion. I was so impressed I decided to take a chance. I am so glad I chose this cd. Josh can really hold his notes. His smooth soothing voice is just what I needed for a few moments ...

Josh Groban's talent gets richer, fuller, and more nuanced with each CD. I fell in love with his voice from the first recording, and am never disappointed. He's a gift to music. He's also made me want to learn Italian.

Customers consider this Josh Groban album one of his best works, featuring a nice compilation of show tune chestnuts where he sings songs that are easy to understand. They praise his voice for its perfect control and heavenly quality, while also appreciating his talent as a performer.
